title: The reason why Pep Guardiola has BANNED chocolate for everyone at Manchester City's training HQ
text:
Sport Pep Guardiola bans selling of chocolate at Manchester City training base in bid to maintain fitness levels Chocolate is still allowed on the site but players, staff and visitors will not be allowed to purchase it as they previously were Share Big changes have been made to City's training campus Share Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
Pep Guardiola has moved to ban the selling of chocolate and sugary snacks at Manchester City's Etihad Campus training base. 
City's finely tuned athletes already stick to a strict dietary regime but Guardiola has moved to ensure they remain at the peak of their physical fitness. 
While chocolates are still allowed on site, they are no longer available to purchase, as they were before the new manager’s arrival, report the Manchester Evening News. 
Staff after a sweet fix will now have to buy their high-sugar or high-fat foods away from their place of work, as Guardiola’s push for healthy living spreads throughout the club. 
Guardiola’s nutritionist Silvia Tremoleda has started providing healthy meals for all staff, rather than just the team. 
Dishes consist of fish, quinoa, pasta, salad, rice and chicken. 
Free fruit and gym membership have long-been available to club employees. 
Tremoleda is well-known in Spain as an author and former dietitian for Barcelona, working with five-time Ballon d’Or winner Lionel Messi. 
A former triathlete and professional tennis player, she has been entrusted to implement the exacting dietary standards demanded by Guardiola. Guardiola has made major changes since arriving at City (Photo: Getty) Samir Nasri is one of the players who was exiled by Guardiola (Photo: Action Images via Reuters) 
The City manager exiled players like Sami Nasri from first team training after deeming them to be overweight when he first took over in July. 
He also expects players to get adequate sleep and rest time in between matches in order to meet up to his famed high pressing game. 
Yaya Toure is one player who has noticeably lost weight since his arrival.
